name: Booklet – Hotel booking system by user email
author: Themeatelier

sections.description: Booklet Booking System is a very simple booking system plugin. With this plugin, you add a simple booking form for or anything to reserve for your customers. It has very nice option panel to add a title, subtitle, and email for the form. It can be used in your sites post and pages with very simple WordPress shortcode. Hotel reservation confirm by user e-mail address.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Booklet Booking System’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings => Booklet Settings => and follow the options how you need.

short_description: A hotel reservation confirm (by user e-mail) plugin for WordPress sites
